tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I got referred to Dr. Sushal after consecutive shoulder dislocations. He sat me down and explained what is wrong and why I need surgery, and how it will benefit me. I've been very physically active all my life and I was apprehensive about the surgery as I was also exploring conservative ways of exercising and the long recovery was looking daunting. The surgery went smoothly, the recovery was very fast for me. After 3-4 months itself I was allowed to slowly start exercising along with the physio. I wanted an athlete centric approach to my treatment, so that I can go back to my life of working out at the gym, go boxing and swimming; and I got that here. Here I am, 6 months after the surgery,  on my way to get stronger than before.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am writing this review after 12 weeks of my son’s right shoulder surgery [arthroscopic bankart repair].

I came to know about Dr. Sushal Shanta Kumar through our long trusted and renowned pediatrician doctor.

Based on this advice, I consulted Dr. Sushal to understand the treatment process for the injury sustained by my son. 
He patiently heard the case, physically examined my son and forthwith identified the problem causing discomfort to my Son. This was corroborated by the MRI Scan report as well. 

Dr. Sushal after careful examination of all reports and physical examination of my son suggested us to go for bankart surgery for repair of the shoulder. He drew the parts of the shoulder and explained in detail the root cause of the issue causing discomfort to my Son’s right shoulder. He as well showed a video which had complete details that helped us understand, the root cause of the discomfort and the treatment process for repair of the injury, in a more practical way. These treatment qualities and skills are the true traits of a real experienced expert doctor.

The surgery was done in Manipal Hospital by Dr. Sushal and his team.
We were in the hospital for two nights and were discharged on the third day.
In the post-surgery consulting visits, he checked upon the recovery progress and taught some exercises as well.
My Son is currently in physiotherapy sessions and is on the road towards complete recovery.

A big thanks to Dr. Sushal Shanta Kumar for supporting us through out with all his expert skills and a very good attitude. He was always there whenever we needed his support.
He is a wonderful orthopedic who is always helpful, compassionate & lovely to speak with, at every appointment.

We are extremely happy to have come to know about Dr. Sushal who in my personal opinion is arguably the best shoulder orthopedic expert doctor in Bengaluru.
 
I would definitely recommend Dr. Sushal Shanta Kumar to anyone requiring a shoulder or any orthopedic injury treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited for adhesive capsulitis in right shoulder.

I visited Dr.Sushal Shanthakumar for pain in my right shoulder which I has having from the past 4 years. Dr.Sushal Shanthakumar is very experienced and professional Doctor. 
Being a sportsperson, I found it very difficult to play sports. I had given up playing both my favourite sports cricket and Badminton for 1 year due to pain. Also, I was unable to sleep on my right side. I had done X ray and MRI scan prescribed by my previous doctor. As per the MRI report, I had adhesive capsulitis in my right shoulder. Through a Doctor known to me, I came in contact with Dr.Sushal Shanthakumar. He listened to my problems very patiently and examined my shoulder thoroughly. The way he guided me was really appreciable. He advised physical therapy exercises which involved stretching, mobility and strength training. The physical therapy sessions were excellent. I strictly followed the guidelines prescribed by the Doctor. Gradually pain in my shoulder reduced and after strengthening, I was able to start playing sports. Within a span of six months, I recovered completely. His clinic is very well maintained, very spacious with good hygiene. I would strongly recommend Dr.Sushal Shanthakumar for any shoulder, sports and orthopaedic injuries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am writing this 6 weeks after my surgery (arthroscopic bankart repair) and the recovery has been progressing well and even better than my expectations!

I visited Dr. Sushal after 3 years of recurrent subluxation due to shoulder instability. He took the time to understand the history, the present condition and explained it very well. He patiently explained all the questions in detail and helped my family and me understand both the surgical procedure and the underlying condition anatomically through drawings and videos. Just after the first visit, all my apprehensions were gone and I was mentally prepared for the surgery and I believe that is very important for any procedure.

Post-surgery, he gave me confidence at each stage of the recovery and that helped just as much as the exercises :D 

Overall, I felt that he is a wonderful person and I really appreciate the support he has provided till now. I would definitely recommend Dr. Sushal to anyone with a shoulder or an orthopedic injury.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Sushal sir is so friendly,kind hearted and so patience in listening to all our health issues.Though i had my MRI scan already done for my shoulder,he believed in his examination which a good Doctor's quality is.Doctor is so brilliant and confident in explaining the exact cause of my shoulder pain can be both from labral tear with capsulitis but also neurological pain with his thorough clinical examination of my shoulder.As he decided not to directly go with surgery,Treatment started with physical exercises,intraarticular steroid injection to treat capsulitis and finally i realised there was mild subluxation of my shoulder which i didnot notice till then.Finally,got operated arthroscopic bankarts repair for my left shoulder 8weeks back in Manipal hospital.His reassurance and post operative care was too good, now able to do all my work.Now,finally ruled out neurological cause of my pain.14 years of my cry,depression was finally ruled out. His suggestions made me mentally strong and motivated.  
              His clinic was maintained with good hygiene, staff was so friendly.*               *** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** **** ****** I strongly recommend him for all ortho related issues especially shoulder.Thank u so much sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Back in 2018 I met with a road accident where I suffered shoulder(left) dislocation leading to bankart's lesion. The injury was so severe that the shoulder dislocated repeatedly while doing day to day activities like wearing a shirt, strapping my backback etc. This is when I met Dr. Sushal and told him about my condition. With the MRI reports clearly stating the labrum tear and with a few shoulder mobility tests, Dr. Sushal advised me to undergo a surgery. Dr. Sushal helped me understand the entire procedure which somewhat helped me relax and take confident decision to proceed with the surgery. He also helped me chalk out a plan on how the recovery should happen post surgery. The day of the surgery I was much more relaxed and with the highly trained and expert team the entire procedure was done in about an hour. In less than 48 hours, I was discharged as well. With my monthly scheduled appointments, there was tremendous progress just after 2.5 weeks. Fast forwarding to 120th day and I was already driving car, doing push ups and yes returning to football.I would like to thank Dr. Sushal for helping me get around this so quickly and feeling much more confident about my shoulder.Thank you doc, *** *** *** *****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Shoulder SLAP (Tear) Lesions,Ligament and Tendon Repair,Bankart Repair,Arthroscopy,
review:
What impressed me is the detailed examination and at the same time reassurance and explanations, he gives, at the same time exuding calmness which is very comforting, I have undergone arthroscopic bankart repairs and post-surgery, I am really impressed with my results and feel like my shoulder is stable than before and confidence for getting the full range of motion with good pain management without compromising my lifestyle.

I would any day recommend Dr. Sushant. Thanks a lot.​​​​

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a problem with recurrent left shoulder dislocation. Primary injury was from badminton, some 10 years ago and i was not convinced with any doctor at that time and choose to be careful and not go for a surgery. 

A recent dislocation got me to explore more and met up with Dr. Sushal at Manipal Hospital. He explained the problem well and since i had 120 degree ligament tear i had to take up an 'arthroscopic bankart repair with bio Sutures' surgery. Till date, i had not been given this clear picture on the problem by any other doctor.

The surgery went very well, * ********* ******** Now after 12 weeks, i feel quite confident to move my left arm more freely, without fear of dislocation. The 100% recovery could take 4-6 months along with physio excersice, but i'm 90% there and feel happy about my decision to undergo surgery with Dr. Sushal.

Thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I was suffering with shoulder impingement  for more than 2 years. I visited many doctors who just suggested me for physio and pain killer tablets, but all in vain. This prevented me from doing gym exercises, playing cricket or any other sport. I met doctor Sushal who understood the issue,the pain i was going through and  based on the 3T MRI he suggested me for a shoulder impingement surgery. I underwent the surgery and i have no pain like before.Thanks to Sushal for giving a clear picture of it and helping me out. *** ** *** **** ******* **** **** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

The surgery went smoothly, the recovery was very fast for me. After 3-4 months itself I was allowed to slowly start exercising along with the physio. I wanted an athlete centric approach to my treatment, so that I can go back to my life of working out at the gym, go boxing and swimming; and I got that here. Here I am, 6 months after the surgery,  on my way to get stronger than before.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My grandmother, Kalawati, had severe pain in her right shoulder for a about a year now. We visited various doctors , went through various physio theraphy sessions as per their advise, but all in vain. We finally got to know about Dr. Sushal and visited him. *** ********* ********* ** *** ******* **** *** ******** *** ***** ** **** *** ******* *** ****** **** ** ********** He advised us for physio therapy which was done by Dr. Ranadip banerjee, who also had expertise in his work and within 10days of physio therapy she started having much relief in her pain. We are very satisfied with both the doctors and highly recommend them for all your shoulder issues.We wish them all the success in life.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My husband had an arthroscopic Bankart repair 5 weeks back . 
This was a great experience. Hats off to Dr. Sushal Shanthakumar for his medical expertise. He is one of those leading doctors who understands medical problem in entirety and thereby plans individual treatment protocol. This treatment approach enabled complete restoration of shoulder movements. It would not be wrong to state that he is one stop solution to all shoulder problems. 
I strongly recommend all patients to utilize his medical expertise to the fullest extent. 
I am blessed to have such a doctor in my life. Thanks once again.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr. Sushal has treated my shoulder dislocation with a procedure called arthroscopic bankart repair. I had dislocated my shoulder twice and was concerned if this would turn into recurring dislocation. I had consulted multiple orthopedic doctors, but didn't get a clear picture of neither the problem nor the solution.
Dr. Sushal is a very honest and straight forward man and having specialized in shoulder, he could give me a very clear picture of where I stand and what my options are. That I think is as important as the surgery itself with so much information one perceives now a days. Coming to the surgery, I was just admitted for < 2 days and it was as smooth as it can get. It has been two months since my surgery and I can't be happier with the result. For any shoulder related / orthopedic problems, I would recommend him as the go-to doctor for all of you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was suffering from a torn muscle in my shoulder and underwent a keyhole endoscopic repair of the muscle. I visited a lot of doctors before finalising with Dr Sushal. *** ****** ****** ** ** ********* ************* ***** *** ******* *** answered all my queries regarding the surgery & physio.
It is now 3 months after the surgery and i have  fully recovered all my movements of the shoulder and pain free.
I like the way of his interaction, very friendly and reassuring.
I am very satisfied and will recommend him for anyone with any shoulder problems.

tags: None
review:
Dr. Sushal was really good in treating my shoulder injury. He was a really nice person and that made it all the more easier to go ahead with the surgery. It was a keyhole surgery and Dr. Sushal did a good job at keeping me and my family members calm before, during and after the surgery. He was always available on his cellphone and never hesitated to help.  Even several months after the surgery, he'd remember exactly what he did with enough detail to be able to tell my physiotherapist how to proceed with the recovery exercises. He always displayed thorough knowledge in the subject matter and put it across in a very easily understandable manner, which gave us all a sense of comfort. 
Overall, a really good doctor and an even better person, would strongly recommend him to anyone looking for a good orthopedic surgeon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went to Dr. Sushal for the Orthoscopic Bankart Repair Procedure for my left shoulder. I was initially very hesitant about having surgery but the doctor's cheery nature *** **** ********* ** *** ***** gave me the confidence to go ahead. He patiently explained in detail the Bankart's Repair procedure and the anesthesia involved. The day of the surgery itself went like a breeze. He visited me later in the day and showed me a few exercises to regain my range of motion.

It has now been 3 months post-op and I have recovered 90% of my range. I must say a huge thank you to the doctor for helping me with the right exercises and movement advice over the last few months.

I highly recommend coming to Dr. Sushal for any Shoulder related issues, as he possess deep expertise in the field.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First of all he is an excellent human having genuine concern for the patient. He listens to the patient's problem and addresses all the concerns and and patiently answers all questions. In my sixty years of experience I haven't come across a doctor who has satisfied me to this extent . His very talk will cure more than 50 % of the patient's pain and problem. He explained in detail pros and cons of surgery and gave a detailed explanation of the surgical procedure. He is a dedicated professional with service orientation. I pray for his happiness, health and prosperity.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had shoulder pain *** **** ** ****** hospital, Shesdipuram and was told by doctor ** ****** ******** that I should undergo operation on my left shoulder. I went to Manipal Hospital to seek second opinion and met Dr. Sushal Shantakumar, Shoulder specialist . He examined my x-ray report and told me that operation is not necessary. He prescribed medical treatment and physiotherapy. Within two week, my recovery has been improved very much. I am very happy and thanks to Dr. Sushal Shantakumar for his excellent expertise in shoulder injury.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Injured my left shoulder during workout,was very painful/discomforted, was not able to change my car gear,also did my MRI scan on others advice.finally met Dr SUSHAL ,heard me so patiently, personally checked all the movements /strength and diagnosed with bicep tendonitis.also told me that MRI scan was not all Necessary. 
Suggested with tablets and rest ,with in 2days of medication ,was feeling lot comfortable ,in a weeks time ,was able to drive .
Presently ,I have also started lifting light weights in my workout.
I want to thank dr Sushal to bring back normalcy in me and highly recommend him for any shoulder related issues.
THANK YOU once again dr sushal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sushal Santhakumar is a young, energetic and brilliant doctor.He looks very sharp in diagnosis of my son's shoulder injury .His confidence in dealing with the issues rightly reflects his vast experience as well as expertise in the field he is associated with . The most positive aspect of Dr. Sushal's virtues is his openness.He answered all our queries with remarkable ease and clarity and explained all the technicalities associated with the shoulder injury very distinctly both by verbally as well as video representations. Dr. Sushal is so friendly that in no point of time we felt uneasy in interacting with him.He talked with us in whatever language we felt at comfort in.Anyway,we have returned home with a feeling of being quiet fortunate to meet a great doctor in Sushal Santhakumar who may well be recommended to other patients .After a successful right-hand bankart surgery of our son Devanga,we are looking forward to meet him again in the subsequent check-up.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went to see Dr. Sushal to fix a SLAP tear in the shoulder, with small tears to 2 other rotator cuff muscles and arthropathy of the AC joint. To fix the shoulder, Dr. Sushal recommended a surgery. I am extremely pleased with the outcome and have made an exceptional recovery, regaining most of the mobility within 10 weeks. He was very thorough in his examination and very patient in explaining the issue and the proposed treatment plan. He is extremely friendly and approachable. These 2 points stand out when compared to most other surgeons. He has the ability of inspiring confidence in the treatment plan, which is extremely crucial especially since the path ahead of an injury always seems uncertain. His competence is evident, seeing as I am recovering from a chronic shoulder issue that I thought would never get better. I highly recommend Dr. Sushal for your orthopedic needs, especially for shoulder issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My father had a 3 year old injury which restricted his shoulder movements and caused unbearable pain. Dr. Sushal not only diagnosed the depth of the injury to utmost perfection, but also helped in surgically repairing the same with ease. The Doctor also recommended good exercises to regain strength in the muscles. My father has quickly recovered and  is now able to make unrestricted movements with his shoulder. Dr Sushal is a reachable and a very friendly person. You can definitely rely on his diagnosis and treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had injured my knee while playing football. The pain had not receeded even after a few days so I was worried if it was any ligament injury or dislocation. Dr. Sushant enquired in detail how the injury happened and went on to examine my knee in detail. He spent a lot of time examining my knee to ensure that all possible issues are checked. He diagnosed it as a bone bruising and it was comforting to k ow that there was nothing majot to worry. What impressed me is the detailed examination and at the same time reassurance and explanations he gives, at the same time exuding calmness which is very comforting. I would any day recommend Dr. Sushant. Thanks a lot doc!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I met Dr. Sushal for an injury to the shoulder. Soon after the scans revealed labrum tear, he decided to use conservative methods first up. When they didn't result in any improvement, he asked me to undergo a surgery. I had a bankart repair done by him on August 6, 2018. Not only was the surgery comfortable, he ensured the recovery process was smooth as well. I was given realistic timelines and made most of my recovery within the predicted time. 

***** **** *** ********* *** ****** he doesn't rush you, takes time to understand and help formulate a plan, is friendly and patient while trying to help you. Available at all times in case of queries and also helps the patient understand the issue properly.

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I had an injury to my foot while playing which was serially misdiagnosed as ligament tear , ankle sprain and then bone oedema. I was consulting a very well known consultant at Manipal Hospital Old Airport Road. As a result I was put on a plaster 1.5 month after the accident happened in Feb. Even after my plaster came off recovery was very slow. Still I did not know what the exact cause was. Doctor I was consulting did not seem to have an opinion or the interest to provide a prognosis.  It was then that I consulted Dr.Sushal at his Praxis clinic. I had all the while known about him but was a bit hesitant as his profile is of a shoulder specialist *** ** ** ********** *** ** *** **** ** ********* *** ********* However then I came to know that shoulder is one of the most complex assemblies and decided to consult him. It paid off and finally I had a proper explanation of my condition and firm guidance on recovery. Dr. Sushal looked at my past reports and concluded that there was a fracture to my fibula which was not picked up all this while. He took me through the X Ray reports  and patiently with help of diagram explained where exactly the break was. He got another X ray done which showed that the break was healing and advised course of healing. Thanks to Dr. Sushant that I now seem to have a closure on my problem. Only wish I had consulted him Day 1.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Had dislocated my shoulder multiple times due to a football injury. Visited the doctor for recurrent shoulder dislocation. He explained me the issue well and adviced for an MRI where we could see in detail the injured parts.

I would definitely recommend the doctor and it is very difficult to find such a good doctor who comforts you for going to a surgery. If you are looking for a shoulder related solutions, he is the go to doctor for you.

Thank you doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Sushal Shanthakumar is a very friendly *** * ****** ************* ********** ******** He understands the problem easily and explains in a manner understandable by a layman. I visited him for a problem in my lumbar and cervical region. He easily understood the problem and suggested a couple of conventional methods to relieve me of pain. There is a considerable improvement in my condition now. Highly recommended!!

tags: None
review: It was an awesome experience with Dr. Sushal. He explained the injury and the treatment. I underwent a surgery and recovered completely after the surgery. He's an amazing doctor and gives you time and explains all the details. *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** I recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Professional doctor who explained the pre,surgery and post rehab perfectly and it has been moving same way. I am highly satisfied with the Doctor treatment and friendly attitude which helped me achieve resp milestones. I will recommend the Dr Sushal in his specialisation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I just visited the clinic without knowing much about the doctor as I met with an bike accident. But as soon as I talk to the doctor, felt like very comfortable. Doctor explained the problem clearly. Treatment is in progress.. Most importantly he followed up today and first time I see a doctor kind enough to remember and follow up the patient. Will suggest him any day. Thank you doctor.

I strongly recommend him for ortho related issues.Thank you Sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr. Sushal for elbow pain that got aggravated due to weekend swimming.  Dr. Sushal was friendly and quickly diagnosed the root of the issue and confirmed the same by an X-ray.  He suggested physiotherapy to address the pain.

Very professional and patiently explained the reason for the symptoms.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Lively Doctor generating good faith. Explains methodically. Does not recommend too much of medication. 

I am yet to complete my physiotherapy exercise - the last 10th session fixed on 30th Jan,18, that did'nt happen ; due to my work disposition. Request to postpone 10th Physiotherapy session (Last) on 1st Feb, 18(Thur).

Request SMS forwarded to Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
ACL Injury : Consulted Dr. Sushal (With MRI report) after visiting many other orthopedic doctors in Bangalore, where they told me to undergo ACL reconstruction surgery and I was unsure about it. However, Dr. Sushal was very knowledgeable and took time to explain my condition and treatment options, then suggested me to go for physiotherapy as my knee weren't straight as my other knee. I took 20 sessions of physiotherapy (Rejoice Physiotherapy in Kasturi Nagar, Bangalore), where I can feel the difference and leg became straight and flexible enough to walk properly. The good news is after the second consultation, Dr. Sushal said not to undergo ACL surgery as I don't have any symptoms for the surgery. His skill and expertise as an orthopedic doctor were evident.

I highly recommend Dr.Sushal to anyone in need of orthopedic care. 
Thank you for your great work! Dr.Sushal :-)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I dislocated my right shoulder while playing a sport a year ago.I felt apprehensive and bothered about its stability in general. I was referred to Dr.Sushal by a doctor at Manipal for my condition 3 months ago.I underwent a bankart repair surgery after a couple of appointments with him. With regular physiotherapy post surgery I feel a lot better and can do 90% of activities. I have been told that I can resume all activities within a couple of months. Dr.Sushal is approachable *** ************* and I will recommend him to others for shoulder related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
It was an great experience with Dr. Sushal Shanthakumar. Two years ago I met with an accident and consulted Dr. Sushal Shanthakumar. He explained me the shoulder injury and the treatment in detail. I underwent a surgery *** ********* ********** ***** *** ******** **** ** ********* ********* expert in shoulder related injuries and he explains all the details with a lot of patience in understandable way. I have never seen doctor like him treating patient as friend. Hats off to his friendly nature. 

I will always recommend him for any shoulder injuries.

Thanks a lot Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor was very thorough in examining my shoulder before anything else. He did a very detailed test of all my movements and pain points of my shoulder, only after this did he even look at the MRI scan that I had gotten.
He then explained to me very well what my issue was. He used great pictures/animations and videos from his computer to clearly help me visualize the issue. He was very friendly and open. He answered all of my questions (around 20 questions) that I had prepared in my second consultation, very clearly and patiently.
He was the only ortho that I had visited (4 others) that diagnosed my hyper-mobility and explained it's consequences. Even though he is a shoulder specialist surgeon, he recommended that I do not do surgery because that would be a better route for me.

Extremely good doctor. Would recommend fully to anybody with shoulder issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
I was suffering with shoulder pain for over 5 months which had worsened overtime. Shoulder Specialist in Sakra Hospital advised me for Arthroscopy with diagnosis of SLAPII tear. I visited Dr Sushal for second opinion. He diagnosed me with Frozen shoulder caused by under utilization of the shoulder joint. He gave me good explanation of the diagnosis and advised me to undergo physio therapy. In just a weeks time I am making a very good progress. I will like to thank him for avoiding an unnecessary surgery. 

I definitely recommend Dr. Sushal  for shoulder problems.
